events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department in our tracking system for further evaluation.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the upcoming stages of the hiring process.
We completed your initial screening focusing on your software development skills and experience. You passed to the next step.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming your availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview is scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 14:00 UTC via video conference with our senior engineers.
The technical interview has been successfully completed. Feedback was very positive regarding your coding and problem-solving skills.
An HR interview is scheduled for 2024-05-15 at 11:00 UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
The HR interview concluded positively with a mutual fit in terms of values and expectations for the role.
We have sent you an official job offer for the Software Engineer position, including salary details and onboarding plans.
We received your positive feedback on the offer and appreciate your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
Congratulations! Your acceptance of the offer has been recorded, and we are excited to welcome you on board.
Your onboarding process has officially started with orientation sessions and setup of your development environment.
The hiring process is now completed successfully, and you are fully integrated into the engineering team.
